overview: The Italian superstar Roberta Gemma needs no introduction. The Italian pornstar bombshell is back for another epic scene. She runs a sex clinic in the center of Rome. Her clients generally suffer from all forms of sexual disorders.  Today's case is a bit particular. Well hung stud Chris Diamond has an issue. As successful he can be in front of the camera, he faces challenges home with his girlfriend. The later doesn't want to have sex with him. He's too big for her. Dr Gemma will sacrifice herself to prove her wrong. She got both her holes annihilated by the thick Spaniard.  In Rome, Italian MILF Valeria gets ass fucked by her husband Juan Lucho just before going to work.  Italian pornstar Vittoria Risi has been naughty lately. Her husband, Yanick, suspects she's cheating. Only way she found to make him forget about it is to give him her ass.
title: Sex & Dolce Vita
